description: There's nothing like a forearm tattoo to show off your personality!  There's something about forearm tattoos that makes them incredibly attractive. Maybe it's the fact that they're highly visible, or maybe it's the fact that they can be both delicate and bold. Whatever the reason, forearm tattoos are a popular choice for both men and women. In this tattoo category, we'll take a look at ten of the best forearm tattoos for men and women.
